comment: Meet a whirlwind of energy and laughter. A trading whiz, carefree about academics, a sly manipulator, yet undeniably fun and talented. All the best for your future, stay in touch!

comment: With a laugh that's as mischievous as it is infectious, and a refusal to ever turn down an adventure, Ritik is the life of the party. Despite his cunning wit, he's always a 'no' to a trip-up in fun!'
name: Gaveesh Garg

comment: A person who you can learn a lot from. Passionate about economics, history and films. Future entrepreneur. A topper in disguise 🐍
name: R Harsh

comment: He effortlessly connects with everyone, bringing laughter and wit to every conversation. A mind that is financially smart and gets things done in the real world and not just books. A great friend in all aspects !!!
name: Suraj Kumar Yadav

comment: Bro, definitely has potential to become a millionaire. Also had teach me how to apply for financial aid on coursera even if you have money 🌚. Baaki paisa aa jaye toh bhul mat jaana.

comment: Hi Ditik! "Nagapanchmi hai tow bheed tow bohot hogi 🤫 "Shivji ke darshan karne ke liye pure-pure group ko manipulate kr diya. Always ready to pay bills(krde yarr shrid, mai tow hamesha krta hu 😂), BBQ, chai, bottle collection, varisu movie🙂,chamdeke chappal and alot. Tomake misa karaba, Nepali! "

comment: .From being flatmate in quarantine to the end of college, been through fighting w/ stranger, bike trip, car trip, had awesome time w/ u. Stock market share treding to bargaining w/ auto wala, u r just lit 🔥. Shining 🌟 in ur own fields 💪. Hope to see u soon😊
name: Omraj Dhore

comment: A dynamic force, radiating positivity and enthusiasm, possess a deep passion for the stock market, driven by curiosity and strategic acumen. With natural leadership qualities, you inspire others to excel, navigating uncertainties with confidence and charting paths to success both in finance and life
name: Archit Amal

comment: An amazing friend and had a great time knowing you bro. You are a smart individual with a humorous side. You are a cool and honest guy bro and wish u the best of luck. Hope to see you soon.
